description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nMaster of Wolpertingers:
If all the creatures in your party are {RACE_Wolpertinger}s, their Scourge spells always deal critical damage and have a 50% chance to be cast 1 additional time. This effect can occur multiple times in a row. This trait does not stack.
name: Sigil of the Wolpertinger
